min-string: ${name} must be at least ${Param} in length
max-string: ${name} must be a maximum of ${Param} in length
lt-string: ${name} must be less than ${Param} in length
lt-datetime: ${name} must be less than the current Date & Time
lte-string: ${name} must be at maximum ${Param} in length
lte-datetime: ${name} must be less than or equal to the current Date & Time
gt-string: ${name} must be greater than ${Param} in length
gt-datetime: ${name} must be greater than the current Date & Time
gte-string: ${name} must be at least ${Param} in length
gte-datetime: ${name} must be greater than or equal to the current Date & Time
gtecsfield: ${name} must be greater than or equal to ${target}
ltecsfield: ${name} must be less than or equal to ${target}
gtefield: ${name} must be greater than or equal to ${target}
ltefield: ${name} must be less than or equal to ${target}
numeric: ${name} must be a valid numeric value
hexcolor: ${name} must be a valid HEX color
rgb: ${name} must be a valid RGB color
rgba: ${name} must be a valid RGBA color
hsl: ${name} must be a valid HSL color
hsla: ${name} must be a valid HSLA color
email: ${name} must be a valid email address
base64: ${name} must be a valid Base64 string
containsany: ${name} must contain at least one of the following characters '${Param}'
excludesall: ${name} cannot contain any of the following characters '${Param}'
isbn: ${name} must be a valid ISBN number
isbn10: ${name} must be a valid ISBN-10 number
isbn13: ${name} must be a valid ISBN-13 number
uuid3: ${name} must be a valid version 3 UUID
uuid4: ${name} must be a valid version 4 UUID
uuid5: ${name} must be a valid version 5 UUID
printascii: ${name} must contain only printable ascii characters
datauri: ${name} must contain a valid Data URI
longitude: ${name} must contain a valid longitude coordinates
ssn: ${name} must be a valid SSN number
ipv4: ${name} must be a valid IPv4 address
ipv6: ${name} must be a valid IPv6 address
ip: ${name} must be a valid IP address
cidr: ${name} must contain a valid CIDR notation
cidrv4: ${name} must contain a valid CIDR notation for an IPv4 address
cidrv6: ${name} must contain a valid CIDR notation for an IPv6 address
tcp_addr: ${name} must be a valid TCP address
tcp4_addr: ${name} must be a valid IPv4 TCP address
tcp6_addr: ${name} must be a valid IPv6 TCP address
udp_addr: ${name} must be a valid UDP address
udp4_addr: ${name} must be a valid IPv4 UDP address
udp6_addr: ${name} must be a valid IPv6 UDP address
ip_addr: ${name} must be a resolvable IP address
ip4_addr: ${name} must be a resolvable IPv4 address
ip6_addr: ${name} must be a resolvable IPv6 address
unix_addr: ${name} must be a resolvable UNIX address
mac: ${name} must contain a valid MAC address
